CategoryDTO create(CategoryDTO dto,
                   String parentId,
                   int order)
                   throws PMSException
Creates a category.

Parameters:
dto - Category to save.
parent - Parent category id. If null the root category will be used.
order - Order.
Returns:
The saved category.
Throws:
PMSException - If an error occurs.

move

CategoryTreeDTO move(String categoryId,
                     String parentId,
                     int order)
                     throws PMSException
Moves a category.

Parameters:
categoryId - Category.
parentId - Parent category. If null the parent is unchanged.
order - Order.
Returns:
The updated category tree.
Throws:
PMSException - If an error occurs.

delete

CategoryTreeDTO delete(String id)
                       throws PMSException
Deletes a category.

Parameters:
id - Id of the category.
Returns:
The resulting category tree.
Throws:
CategoryNotFoundException - if the category is not found.
CategoryInUseException - if the category is in use and cannot be deleted.
PMSException

exportBranch

String exportBranch(String id,
                    boolean exportRoot,
                    boolean allLevels)
                    throws PMSException
Export a category branch.

Parameters:
id - Branch root id.
exportRoot - Whether to include the root category.
allLevels - Whether to include all descendant levels.
Returns:
URL to download the exported file.
Throws:
PMSException

importCategories

void importCategories(String id,
                      String fileId,
                      boolean sameLevel,
                      boolean overwrite)
                      throws PMSException
Import categories.

Parameters:
id - Destination category.
fileId - Uploaded file id.
sameLevel - Whether to import in the same level.
overwrite - Whether to overwrite existing types.
Throws:
InvalidImportFileException - if unable to parse the uploaded file.
PMSException
